meanings.definition: Inclined to avoid work or activity
meanings.sent1: He is the laziest student in the class, always avoiding homework.
meanings.sent2: The cat is the laziest animal in the house, sleeping all day.
meanings.sent3: Even the laziest squirrel would have more energy than him.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was the laziest of all, never wanting to think deeply.
meanings.sent5: The laziest clouds hung in the sky, barely moving at all.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of effort or energy
meanings.sent1: The laziest worker in the office never finishes tasks on time.
meanings.sent2: On a hot day, the dog looked laziest, panting in the shade.
meanings.sent3: The laziest river flowed slowly, barely making a sound.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded laziest when she was tired, lacking its usual energy.
meanings.sent5: The laziest wind barely rustled the leaves, hardly felt at all.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of motivation or ambition
meanings.sent1: He had the laziest attitude towards his goals, never taking action.
meanings.sent2: The plant looked laziest when it wasn't watered, wilting slowly.
meanings.sent3: Even the laziest bird would fly higher than that one.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was the laziest of all, lacking creativity and passion.
meanings.sent5: The laziest sun barely peeked through the clouds, casting a weak light.
